products.name: Organic Prana Daily Elixir Blend
products.tagline: Elevate Your Daily Routine With Our Farm Made Superfood Blend
products.description: Enjoy a wholesome blend of ancient grains that promotes gut health and provides lasting energy. Our organic, non-GMO, vegan selection is sprouted, sun-dried, and lightly toasted.
products.preparation: Boil 200 ml water. Blend 1 tbsp of Prana Elixir with water in a separate bowl until thoroughly mixed and lump-free. Add this mixture to the boiling water and reduce to low-medium heat. Add desired amount of sweetener. Optionally, add milk and flavorings like cardamom, blue pea flowers, or saffron.
